name: Revival - Down to Earth
description:
All 3d assets made and textured in blender.

All textures made in paint net from scratch.

Most icons made by hand drawing on a Samsung Galaxy Note 9.

Premade assets used :

Sounds used from soundly.

comic andy font used from 1001fonts.com (free for commercial use licence)

custom depth material from tom looman (gumroad)

Extras & Info:

Left Click to select buildings, right click to rotate building before placing

Press Escape to cancel building place (Warning : you will lose the resources for that building)

Move mouse around corners to pan

Specific buildings have special ability like Workshop & Factory can build drones and space shuttle can send a rocket which bring backs 10 people in 10 minutes.

Click on Trees & Rocks to collect resources (you need drones to do this)

For cheat mode type "helpme" anytime while playing, this will allow you to place any building without any resource, might need to do this a couple of times whenever you cannot buy a building.

Drones will be spawn on some random location, which may be not visible on screen.

Drones will cost 50 Tokens to create even in cheat mode. Try to build buildings which earn money so you can make drones easier.

Fonts will denote - as ' as it does not support that character, please bear with this bug. Any resources which shows with a ' will mean it will reduce instead of gaining.
